name: Lifely
description:
Lifely is a game where you play as a humanoid plant, strolling in a city abandoned by humanity. This game is played with the mouse, the goal is to grow other plants the city using the right click. But be careful, you will need water and light to survive.

Then share your highest score !

This game has been made during the GLaSS 2016 Game Jam, at CRI's game lab @ Tour Montparnasse, Paris.


Game Design : Hugo De Yrigoyen
Graphismes : Michael Destivelle
Programmation : Victor Beaupuy
